Articles.Content:
I\'m not sure if this is in the right section, so sorry of it isn\'t.

Whenever I first go to the runway from the hanger, my spaceplanes start fine. But when I restart from a flight, my spaceplane falls apart immediately. Why is this happening?

I have partially had the same bug with both Spaceplanes and Rockets alike, not sure of the cause.

You were right in your hunch that this wasn\'t the right place.

This would be better suited in KSP Development Forum, read the Bug Reporting guidelines to help the Devs fix the issue more quickly.

Hi guys, you are right Ted, this could have been a bug report but it seems this bug has been found by HarvesteR himself, and the 0.15.2 patch should have helped reduce this problem.

As HarvesteR says, he plans to eliminate this bug completely in 0.16, so update your game and everything should be okay for now.

Hope this helps
